name: v1.5.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Separate CRDs from helm template so in order to skip CRD deployment by @cedricmckinnie in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/100
* Disable AppArmor by @cedricmckinnie in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/101


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/compare/v1.5.1...v1.5.2

name: v1.5.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Use image and tag from values file instead of latest by @tbrasser in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/86
* Update Ingress-how-to.md by @crleekwc in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/87
* various upgrades by @raffaelespazzoli in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/96
* Add flag to enable Unicast support by @cedricmckinnie in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/94
* fixed ci docker build by @raffaelespazzoli in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/98
* Allow custom keepalived-template.yaml and fix notify.sh hash comparator bug by @cedricmckinnie in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/99

## New Contributors
* @tbrasser made their first contribution in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/86
* @crleekwc made their first contribution in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/87

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/compare/v1.4.2...v1.5.1

name: v1.5.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Use image and tag from values file instead of latest by @tbrasser in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/86
* Update Ingress-how-to.md by @crleekwc in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/87
* various upgrades by @raffaelespazzoli in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/96
* Add flag to enable Unicast support by @cedricmckinnie in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/94
* fixed ci docker build by @raffaelespazzoli in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/98
* Allow custom keepalived-template.yaml and fix notify.sh hash comparator bug by @cedricmckinnie in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/99

## New Contributors
* @tbrasser made their first contribution in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/86
* @crleekwc made their first contribution in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/87
* @cedricmckinnie made their first contribution in https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/pull/94

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/redhat-cop/keepalived-operator/compare/v1.4.2...v1.5.0

name: v1.3.4
body:
- added support for disconnected installation migrated to new operatro hub prod repo 1fad40ebe9300870c831e85851b36d694352cdb5 (raffaelespazzoli)
- osdk 1.9 (#73) 3f531dd606153482fe02e8c1875de76198c66c31 (raffaelespazzoli)

- Improve image tag fetch in README d5d427235275135800342d9a98d9c0a2fc5afecd (trevorbox)
- Fix metrics testing README 597fbe71e803d07cda59df305b327fce22ab9b40 (trevorbox)
- Improved Helm chart for kube-rbac-proxy image configuration. 3190cf498d4592bc88d39f878c5d1d6fdc799a63 (trevorbox)

name: v1.3.3
body: - coreos image for kube-rbac-proxy (#70) a5d89b57bc4d443cab46b3e107e855b0827ea095 (Trevor Box)

name: v1.3.0
body:
- fixed reviewers f44b5b655c3011569231fb78961649d6d70b4777 (raffaelespazzoli)
- added reviewers d3422cf955de54effd5cc55eddf94918b914fdcf (raffaelespazzoli)

- Fix import packages in Dockerfile 2157de9a670d23b26fd5b6a2ab8c05bcd0f10bbe (Tommaso Pozzetti)
- Add grep, sed and ip packages to Dockerfile e6e0bba45fe600901c8131c1550eb7b475311f0c (Tommaso Pozzetti)
- Switch awk to grep for ip output parsing 5ad8187695bdfea3241aa842a9cdb41c72bdb233 (Tommaso Pozzetti)

- Refactor notify.sh script 8d4e01b1ad7021b3ca00c87cc0539581bcd731b7 (Tommaso Pozzetti)
- Add docs on interface autodiscovery 1efcccae190b57b797da8d5e52f252f6a6941b4c (Tommaso Pozzetti)
- Enable interface autodiscovery based on a reachable IP a12e8c548bd4f64b1f3046eb475602911be65ac4 (Tommaso Pozzetti)

name: v1.2.2
body:
- Added liveness and readiness probes to helm chart. Removed resource limits from olm template. 4fda251f792395e87a9a0c6555fbede38dadac69 (tbox)
- Helm chart generation now includes crds and uses the default service account with no resource limits. 1a4124b8fd782238d1da03e4c4c8f1c0946b0a93 (tbox)

name: v1.2.0
body:
- Conform to error handling pattern 8e46544a44c97893e353f3be187fe4499145399b (Tommaso Pozzetti)
- Fix spreadvips bug that leads to KeepalivedGroup unable to start 04a55a4b48b100ab796c42c7b4c19a6da595fc21 (Tommaso Pozzetti)
- Add password authentication to KeepalivedGroup 8b03f76f412485fd44cf9fa432e4870bf447e807 (Tommaso Pozzetti)

name: v1.1.0
body:
- Update keepalived-operator.clusterserviceversion.yaml 303dcb25c16f3e643c68aa57b5bf500ffd968d30 (raffaelespazzoli)

- Handle local externalTrafficPolicy correctly 44e1f6015357c39645dd2f7660630064baec24aa (Tommaso Pozzetti)
